code.comment: Code lines over 80 characters should be split into separate lines.
'''print(cout << "Hello, how are you today? I hope you are having a most fantastic day!"'''
'''print("Hello, how are you today?, end='') print("I hope you are having a most fantastic day!")'''
Do not put multiple statements on a single line.
